additionalProperty.name: Ingredients
additionalProperty.value: acesulfame potassium aspartame carmellose sodium carmoisine aluminium lake copovidone Flavour macrogol 20000 magnesium stearate mannitol xylitol

additionalProperty.name: Contains
additionalProperty.value: Contains Phenylalanine, mannitol, aspartame, sulphites and sodium. The maximum total daily intake (16 tablets) for adults contains 894mg of sodium (take into account if on a low sodium diet). 9.6g of mannitol and 4.6g of xylitol. Products containing mannitol and xylitol may have a laxative effect or cause diarrhoea. 48 Tablets

additionalProperty.name: Warning
additionalProperty.value: Does not contain aluminium, sugar or gluten. - The maximum total daily intake (16 tablets) for adults contains 886mg of sodium (take into account if on a low sodium diet). 9.6g of mannitol and 1.6g of xylitol. - Products containing mannitol and xylitol may have a laxative effect or cause diarrhoea. - Contains aspartame. - Phenylketonurics: contains Phenylalanine. - Contains sulfites. The maximum total daily intake (16 tablets) for adults contains 894mg of sodium (take into account if on a low sodium diet). Contains 9.6g of mannitol and 4.6g of xylitol.
